text: Keith Morrison (born July 2, 1947) is a Canadian broadcast journalist. He has been a writer for Dateline NBC since 1995. In 1988 he joined NBC News as a west coast writer for the NBC Nightly News and Today Show. ==References== ==Other websites== *NBC News biography * *Anchor away: Journalist Keith Morrison has found success south of the border from the Saskatoon Star- Phoenix, July 2, 2003 Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian journalists Category:Writers from Saskatchewan
title: Keith Morrison
